com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Interface DownloadHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDownloadHandler, DefaultDownloadHandler 

    public interface DownloadHandler
    Allows handling file downloads.

    When Browser instance cannot display a specified file (e.g. *.zip file) the allowDownload(DownloadItem) method will be used to check whether this file can be downloaded. If this method returns TRUE, the file download is started.

    You can use this handler to suppress all file downloads or download only files with a specific mime type.
    允许处理文件下载。当浏览器实例无法显示指定的文件（例如* .zip文件）时，将使用allowDownload（DownloadItem）方法检查该文件是否可以下载。如果此方法返回TRUE，则开始文件下载。您可以使用此处理程序来禁止所有文件下载或仅下载具有特定mime类型的文件。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowDownload(DownloadItem download)
      This method is invoked when Browser is going to download a file.
      当浏览器要下载文件时，将调用此方法。

    • Method Detail

      • allowDownload

        boolean allowDownload(DownloadItem download)
        This method is invoked when Browser is going to download a file. The download parameter contains all information about the the file which is going to be downloaded.

        To suppress file download, this method must return FALSE.

        By default the file will be downloaded into application's working directory. You can get the absolute file path using the DownloadItem.getDestinationFile() method. In order to change the destination path, you can use the DownloadItem.setDestinationFile(java.io.File) method.
        当浏览器要下载文件时，将调用此方法。 download参数包含有关将要下载的文件的所有信息。若要禁止文件下载，此方法必须返回FALSE。默认情况下，文件将下载到应用程序的工作目录中。您可以使用DownloadItem.getDestinationFile（）方法获取绝对文件路径。为了更改目标路径，可以使用DownloadItem.setDestinationFile（java.io.File）方法。
        Parameters:
        download - information about the file that will be downloaded. -有关将要下载的文件的信息。
        Returns:
        TRUE to allow downloading the file or FALSE to suppress it. 允许下载文件或禁止显示文件。
